name: Santa and Gem Memory Match
description:
Select a category of matches, such Santa Christmas, through the ‘Menu’ item ‘Choose Category’. Then select the number of matches to make (8, 18, or 32) using the ‘Menu’ item ‘Choose Number Matches’. The playing board to the left of the menu items will be filled in with 16, 36, or 64 image panels that look identical. Each of these panels is covering a randomly placed image related to the category selected. Each image has an identical image covered by another panel.

After selections are completed, select the ‘Menu’ item ‘Start Play’ to begin playing the game. Select two panels to find matching images. Remember the locations of the uncovered images as they will be covered by the panels when additional selections are made. Only two images may be revealed at a time. If the two images match, then they will remain uncovered. Try to match all images with their identical image.
